name: SKYLINE AVIATION GROUP PTY LTD
about: Skyline Aviation Group, based at Lake Macquarie Airport, is a versatile and experienced aviation company founded in 1995. Specializing in helicopter operations, the group offers scenic flights, private charters, helicopter flight training, and UAV services. They provide a range of air work services, including fire and flood relief, aerial crane operations, surveying, and aerial film & photography. The flight training school is renowned for producing some of Australia's best helicopter pilots, offering courses for Private and Commercial licenses, as well as endorsements and ratings. With a strong focus on customer service and safety, Skyline Aviation Group has grown to become the largest helicopter operator in the Greater Hunter region, committed to meeting the diverse needs of its clients.
